title: [Wings to Vikingland]
brief_description: A tour of Sweden, Norway and Denmark by an American couple. The receive a traditional Swedish welcome in Stockholm; visit Lapland and the ancient city of Visby; Norway with its many fiords and mountains; the Viking and Ski Mountains; and finally Denmark - their tour of this country included visits to the royal castle, parliament building and University of Copenhagen.
